This post is used to show how Tranquilpeak theme is configured for Hugo framework. Tranquilpeak theme is compatible with Hugo `v0.53`.  
See [docs](https://github.com/kakawait/hugo-tranquilpeak-theme/blob/master/docs/user.md#tags) for more information.
